title: loging back on after a 2 years only to find out im suspended without any warning!
body:
My league name is - LightBlue 

After 2 years of literally not playing the game i log on and im suspended? really? Can i Have some help? ive spent alot of money on that acct and id i have almost every skin from 2 years ago on every champ. please can i have some type of help or some understand on why i was suspended? not even an email nothing
 Love

replies.body:
Submit an account recovery ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Chances are your account was compromised and used for cheats while you were away. In most cases, player support can reverse any punitive actions taken as a result of compromise once ownership of the account has been verified, and the account itself has been secured.
